name: custom-expo-updates
description: Custom Expo Updates Client and Server

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:modules && pnpm clean:apps && pnpm install
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:apps: rm -rf apps/*/ios && rm -rf apps/*/android && rm -rf apps/*/.expo
